name: Movie Recommendation App
desc: The Movie Recommendation System is an end-to-end Flask-based web app using NLP techniques, offering personalized movie suggestions from a dataset of 4806 films.

name: Email/SMS Spam Detection App
desc: An end-to-end app powered by advanced natural language processing. It seamlessly detects and filters spam, ensuring comprehensive communication security.

name: Bank Stocks Analysis
desc: Explore bank stock prices, emphasizing visualization and pandas skills. Analyze major bank's data using Seaborn, Matplotlib, Plotly, Cufflinks, and Pandas.

name: 911 Calls Analysis & Visualization
desc: Explore and visualize the 911 dataset. It contains emergency call details and location coordinates, enabling statistical analysis and interactive maps.
